snippet: This multimedia chamber opera by the South African artist William Kentridge stretches, contracts, slows and speeds up, and otherwise toys with time.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews William Kentridge chamber opera Refuse the Hour at Brooklyn Academy of Music's Harvey Theater.
lead_paragraph: This multimedia chamber opera by the South African artist William Kentridge stretches, contracts, slows and speeds up, and otherwise toys with time.

headline.print_headline: Time Is the Essence and the Medium
headline.main: Review: In ‘Refuse the Hour,’ Exploring Temporal Extremes
